onclick.condition: ![Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.directors) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.studios) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.sets) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.countries) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.tags) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.trailers)] + [IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.movies1.label) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.movies2.label) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.movies3.label)]

[Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.directors) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.studios) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.sets) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.countries) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.tags) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.trailers)] | ![IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.movies1.label) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.movies2.label) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.movies3.label)]

[IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.tvshows1.label)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.tvshows2.label) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.tvshows3.label)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.studios) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.tags)]

![IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.tvshows1.label)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.tvshows2.label) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(customitem.tvshows3.label)] | [Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.studios) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.tags)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[2]
control.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.music.disable) + ![Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.albums) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.artists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.played) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.addons) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.playlists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.partymode) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.lastfm) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.videos)]

control.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.music.disable) + [Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.albums) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.artists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.played) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.addons) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.playlists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.partymode) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.lastfm) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.videos)]
